text:
all those memories are returning. hearing the sound the dragon on top of the tree and such. act raiser was one of my favorite games back on the snes, though i've beat it only a few times. tend to only go for the final boss then end it, if not using some quick-save/load functionality. 

been listening to a remix of this just a while ago as well.

text: +SupraDarky I like how the ending is all about "now, after the defeat of the demons, people forget about God" or something.

text: This game has a fantastic soundtrack all around.
author: Nagoragama

text: I really like this game's mix of genres and always thought it was disappointing to see the sim part be removed from its sequel, simplifying it and making it lose some of the franchise's appeal in the process. Great theme for the North Wall by Koshiro, very fitting.
author: SupraDarky

text: I agree that the second game is entirely different. But i still think it deserves a chance and some recognition. It had some unique art and music designs as well as a slightly unique gameplay experience.
author: Kakashi Hatake

text: SupraDarky not to mention the sequel was hard af. Barely could beat the first stage
author: Kaiden Stanley
